system
Interface Computer2Space

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
SpaceImpl
public interface Computer2Space
extends java.rmi.Remote

Compute server's abstraction of the compute space (Space)

Field Summary
static java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
           
 
Method Summary
 void broadcast(Broadcast broadcast)
          Used by (Computer) Objects to communicate new shared objects to Space.
 void register(Computer computer)
          Computer objects can use this method to register with a compute space (Space)

SERVICE_NAME

static final java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

register

void register(Computer computer)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Computer objects can use this method to register with a compute space (Space)

Parameters:
computer - Registers a remote computer with the resource allocator that manages the cluster operations
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

broadcast

void broadcast(Broadcast broadcast)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Used by (Computer) Objects to communicate new shared objects to Space. The space in-turn propagates the shared object to other computer proxies, if the shared object encapsulated in the broadcast message contains a newer upper bound.

Parameters:
broadcast - Broadcast message containing a proposed new shared object and the ID of the computer that proposed the new shared object
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
